1.00.name: wordpress/suffusion-bbpress-pack
1.00.description:
Suffusion bbPress Pack helps add bbPress support to your Suffusion-based site. It works by copying a handful of template files to your (child) theme directory. The templates are based on the default bbPress TwentyTen theme, modified suitably to match Suffusion's markup.

Pre-requisites

You need the following to use the plugin:

  • bbPress 2.0 (or higher)
  • Suffusion 4.0.0 (or higher)
  • A child theme of Suffusion. If you are unsure about creating one, use the starter pack.

Using a child theme is strongly recommended, to avoid accidentally wiping your main theme installation clean during a theme upgrade.
